javadoc.text: * Lower symmetric packed matrix. Same storage as{@link no.uib.cipr.matrix.LowerTriangPackMatrix LowerTriangPackMatrix}, but * the upper triangular part is known by symmetry.

javadoc.param: nSize of the matrix. Since the matrix must be square, this * equals both the number of rows and columns
AMatrix to copy contents from. Only the entries of the relevant * part are copied
AMatrix to copy contents from. Only the entries of the relevant * part are copied
deepTrue if the copy is deep, else false (giving a shallow copy). * For shallow copies, A must be a packed matrix

javadoc.text: * Checks the row and column indices, and returns the linear data index
